text: hi friends I'm Rachna from let's talk

floral countable nouns what are

one two three five ten hundred are
called countable nouns for example I

in your bag so the nouns that you can
easily count are called countable nouns
so let's see how many is used with
countable nouns well I have a few
examples with you let's take a look many
in a positive sentence many generally
means a lot or something that is in big
amount basically anything that is more

example she has many friends well
probably Catherine Kelly and George are

that means friends and books are
countable nouns
thus you use many with countable nouns
now let's take a look how many is used
in a negative sentence when many is used
in a negative sentence it means a few or
something that is in smaller amount
let's take a look at the exam
he doesn't have many subjects this
semester that means he has probably two
or three subjects in the next sentence I
don't have many pens well I have a few

positive and negative sentence you use
many only with countable nouns okay

as car is a countable noun you use many

use many in the question now there are

singular is one child many children

much okay friends now let's see how you

with non countable nouns non countable
nouns are those nouns that you cannot

take a look at a look at how much is

that means I have a lot of time to help

often in positive sentence as it sounds

of money so here again we do not use

another inner negative sentence much
